text: 3:11 Rom 10:12; Galesia 3:28; Efesus 1:23Kamaghɨn amizɨ, datɨrɨghɨn bɨbɨziba puvatɨ. Ia ua kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan markɨ, e Judaba ko Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, o e mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghore, o da aghorezir puvatɨ, o igharazir darazir akabav gei, o nguibar atiabar gumazamiziba, o e pura ingangarir gumazibar iti, o e fɨriaghɨrezir gumazamiziba. E kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan kogham. E fo, Krais uabɨra iti, egha Krais uabɨ bar en aven iti.
